messages.message:
<!here>: As a User of a workspace, I am unable to create a deployment from my workspace for an app i just published to production (it says only workspace manager can create a deployment), But I can get to the create a deployment page and fill everything  from the app only to get a error message that says unable to create a deployment. Report a bug? Is this the intended customer experience journey? Video cap below.

Also does this mean all customer developers have to be workspace admins as most likely they will be the ones creating integration connections and deployments?
Off topic but the “@-here” pinged all 192 members on this channel. I am assuming that’s not what you intended. :slightly_smiling_face:
Aaah! Did not intend to. Sorry about that
@andy / @Elan Sharony FYI this feel like a bug. We should not show the option to create a deployment to user from the Apps page right
Yes agreed. There's a backend permission check for creating a deployment which will return an error if the caller is not the workspace admin. We'll get a fix in to remove that button next week
